[info] loaded in 4.96 secs at 2022-04-22T05:26:41 - https://filings.xbrl.org/5493008UUFYDF3ZTHC65/2021-12-31/ESEF/SE/0/lime-2021-12-31-sv.zip/lime-2021-12-31-sv/reports/_IXDS

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 04 - Rapport över finansiell ställning but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill, ifrs-full:Goodwill All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0127.9597] The statement 04 - Rapport över finansiell ställning includes the concept ifrs-full:NoncurrentLeaseLiabilities in the presentation tree. The filing uses an XBRL table called lime:StatementOfFinancialPositionTable to represent this statement. The table includes the dimensions ifrs-full:ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillAxis. The statement presentation group 04 - Rapport över finansiell ställning includes a presentation concept called ifrs-full:NoncurrentLeaseLiabilities. This concept has the following values associated with it that do not appear in the financial statement table lime:StatementOfFinancialPositionTable:
ifrs-full:NoncurrentLeaseLiabilities = 17,381,000
The presentation concept is defined for the statement but no fact values are defined in the instance document that use this line item in the table lime:StatementOfFinancialPositionTable. If the concept appears in the financial statements table, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the statement. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.
In this case the concept NoncurrentLeaseLiabilities is missing from the definition linkbase table nd should be added.
Total Element : ifrs-full:NoncurrentLeaseLiabilities Total period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions :
Rule Element Id:9597 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://xbrl.ifrs.org/taxonomy/2020-03-16/full_ifrs/full_ifrs-cor_2020-03-16.xsd 3865
